rank.funcao: The member's level ranking on the server, active members have more experience and therefore are more prominent in the ranking; sometimes the rating can grant up to 5x XP for each message

gado.funcao: Confirm whether a user is cattle or not

baidu.funcao: Send a greeting to baidu in the chat

curiosidades.funcao: Alonsal will tell a random curiosity (only in Portuguese)

cazalbe.funcao: Alonsal will tell a random joke (only in Portuguese)

usos.geral: >operação< >seu_texto<|Transformará seu texto conforme a operação selecionada.
usos.📠 Anagrama: >📠 Anagrama< >Slomdo<|Cria um anagrama com a palavra ou frase inserida.
usos.⏫ Upper: >⏫ Upper< >Slomdo<|Retorna o texto com todas as letras maiusculas.
usos.😁 Emoji: >😁 Emoji< >Slomdo é procrastinador< >😨<|Retorna o texto nesse formato: "Slomdo😨é😨procrastinador".
usos.🔢 Contador: >🔢 Contador< >Slomdo<|Retorna algumas informações sobre o texto inserido.

text.funcao: It will make your text stylish

ping.funcao: See your ping and Alonsal's ping

wiki.funcao: Search what is informed on wikipedia, the language of wikipedia and its content is defined based on the language of Alonsal.

tempo.usos: >some_location<|Shows the current time in some searched location, los angeles|Shows the weather in Los Angeles, l#o5s an0g%$eles|Shows the weather in Los Angeles, "Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha!"|Show the weather in Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha! without disregarding the entered characters
tempo.funcao: Show current time and lots of other information somewhere, search using "quotes" to not skip any characters

history.usos: |show any event today, 01-21|show some random event on January 21st
history.funcao: Displays events by history on the date informed, can show the current day and any other date, creating lists with all in one day or not (only in Portuguese)

emoji.funcao: Increases the emoji entered (only works with custom emojis from the server)

avatar.usos: |show your avatar, >@<|show the avatar of the mentioned user, >ID<|show avatar based on user id
avatar.funcao: Show your or a user's avatar

server_info.usos: |shows information of the server where the command is executed
server_info.funcao: Displays server information, for example, creation date, owner, moderation level, number of members, voice channels, audio channels, categories and etc.

server_icon.funcao: Shows the icon of the server where you used the command, you can save the image

mine.usos: diamond|minecraft inventory diamond research, saddle|minecraft inventory saddle research
mine.funcao: Search and display information about a minecraft item, in all there are more than 1300 items available for research

user_info.usos: |shows information about you, >@<|shows information about mentioned member, >ID<|shows information about member mentioned with ID
user_info.funcao: Displays information about you or a searched user, for example, account creation date, when you joined the server and ID

channel_info.usos: |shows information of the channel where the command is executed, >#<|shows information of the mentioned channel, >ID<|shows information of the channel with the given ID
channel_info.funcao: Mostra informações do canal informado, tais como data de criação, se é NSFW, se é um canal de áudio, o servidor, seu ID e etc

calc.usos: 1 + 1|returns the value of 1 + 1, +5 1 2 3 4 5|returns all entered numbers plus 5, *3.14 1 2 3 4 5|returns all entered numbers multiplied by 3.14, 5!|returns the value of 5 factorial, 5! + 8!|adds 5 factorial and 8 factorial and returns <mr>40.440</mr>, + 1 2 3 4 5|returns the sum of all numbers entered, * 1 2 3 4 5|returns multiplication of all numbers
calc.funcao: Returns the result of the operations entered, all basic operators (+, -, /, *) are accepted, numbers with comma can be used normally

password.usos: |create a random password with several characters, >password_length<|create the password with the given length, 10|create a password with 10 characters
password.funcao: Generates several random passwords for you to use on your accounts, we still recommend using two-factor authentication apps

jokenpo.usos: |play jokenpo without a defined choice, paper|play jokenpo with chosen role
jokenpo.funcao: Play jokenpo automatically or set, playing without informing rock paper or scissors will make your choice random

moeda.usos: heads|play with heads option, tails|play with tails option
moeda.funcao: To play heads or tails, it is necessary to inform one of the two options to be able to play, this command changes your entries if Alonsal is in another language

dado.funcao: Rolls 1 or multiple dice with multiple faces, the minimum value of faces is 4 and the maximum is 10,000, and the maximum dice limit is 50

pula_predios.funcao: The javascript game set up by Slondo, waxed to the max as it should be

user_painel.funcao: Envie mensagens e sugestões para o Alonsal com o comando <mr>.amail</mr>

idioma.usos: br|sets Alonsal's language to Portuguese, n|sets Alonsal's language to English
idioma.funcao: Changes the Alonsal language on the server, all Alonsal commands and returns are based on the defined server language, even direct message messages

steam.funcao:
Displays various information from a searched profile, information such as games owned, achievements achieved, games 100% completed, badges, level, screenshots and etc.
To search your profile, create a custom link to your Steam profile and use it when searching with .asus

mode.footer:
♨️ | Mensagens com este símbolo serão excluídas automaticamente.
🛑 | Estes comandos não são habilitados para usuários sem cargos administrativos.
🇺🇸 | Use the command /language to switch to american english

guild_painel.funcao: Envie mensagens e sugestões para o Alonsal com o comando <mr>.amail</mr>

anuncio.usos: >@<|set a channel to receive free game ads, rem|turn off game ad for the channel
anuncio.funcao: Notifies the informed role whenever free games are available for a limited time

add_emoji.usos: 🕺 dancing|adds a custom emoji with the name "dancing", >image_file< dancing|added a custom emoji in file, >emoji_link< dancing|added a custom emoji based on the submitted link
add_emoji.funcao: Adds a new emoji to the server with the given name, the input can be an emoji (if you have nitro discord), a file smaller than 256kb or an emoji link copied from another server

add_figurinha.usos: 🕺 dancando|adiciona um sticker customizado com o nome "dancando", >arquivo_de_imagem< dancando|adiciona um emoji customizado em arquivo, >link_do_emoji< dancando|adiciona um emoji customizado com base no link enviado
add_figurinha.funcao: Adiciona um emoji novo ao servidor com o nome informado, a entrada pode ser um emoji (caso você tenha discord nitro), um arquivo com menos de 256kb ou um link de emoji copiado de outro servidor

remove_emoji.usos: 😢|remove the given emoji, >emoji_id<|remove the emoji with the given id
remove_emoji.funcao: Remove the emoji from the server

clear.funcao: Delete chat messages, messages sent 2 weeks ago or more are not deleted due to Discord limitations

lock.usos: |change permissions so @everyone can no longer speak on the channel
lock.funcao: Locks and unlocks the channel, to unlock the channel use <mr>.aunlk</mr> and the settings will be reset to the previous default

site.funcao: Returns the link to this site!

mail.funcao: Send messages and suggestions to Alonsal with the command <mr>.amail</mr>

convite.usos: |invitation to add Alonsal to a server

suporte.funcao: Ajude a desenvolver e manter o Alonsal, toda ajuda é bem vinda
